title: Harvest time
brief_description: Cinemagazine newsreel items including: 1. Ten Thousand Eggs a Day: A big pie-shaped henhouse in Nova Scotia produces eggs with assembly-line regularity. 2. Harvest on the Vine: A look at the Niagara wine industry shows how grapes are pressed and processed into Canadian wine. 3. Follow That Sheep: At Kamloops, British Columbia, a trek to the mountains with seven thousand sheep and two canny sheep dogs.
